global_user_not_found: {emote_warn} Could not find the specified user `{user}`
global_error: **An error has occurred**, please check the the permission level of the bot or try again later. If the issue persists contact the bot developers.
global_cannot_action_self: {emote_warn} You cannot perform this action on yourself!
event_guild_member_add: {emote_plus} New user joined the guild **{user}**#{user_discriminator} `({user_id})` - **Account age:** {age} days
event_guild_member_update_role_add: The **{role}** role has been added to **{user}**#{user_discriminator} `({user_id})`
event_guild_member_update_role_remove: The **{role}** role has been removed from **{user}**#{user_discriminator} `({user_id})`
event_message_delete:
{emote_trash} Message from **{user}**#{user_discriminator} `({user_id})` has been removed in <#{channel_id}> `({channel_id})`
**Content:** {new_value}
configure_missing_arg_setting:
{emote_warn} Missing required argument `setting`
{emote_tools} Correct usage of command: `configure|cfg|setting|config <setting> <new value> | If you want to disable a command put disable inside of the <new value>`
configure_missing_arg_new_value:
{emote_warn} Missing required argument `new value`
{emote_tools} Correct usage of command: `configure|cfg|setting|config <setting> <new value> | If you want to disable a command put disable inside of the <new value>`
configure_default_help:
{emote_warn} Invalid `setting`
{emote_tools} Correct usage of command: `configure|cfg|setting|config <setting> <new value> | If you want to disable command put disable inside of the <new value>`
**Guild settings:** `prefix`, `track_analytics`
**Logging settings:** `mod_action`, `message`, `role|role_update`, `member|member_update`, `channel|channel_update`, `join_leave`
**Role settings:** `mute`
configure_muterole_changed: {emote_success} Changed the muted role to `{role}` in **{guild}**
configure_prefix_change_successful: {emote_success} Successfully updated the prefix to `{new_value}` in **{guild}**
configure_analytics_change_successful: {emote_success} Successfully updated the stace of tracking analytics to `{new_value}` in **{guild}**
override_missing_arg_category:
{emote_warn} Missing required argument `category`
{emote_tools} Correct usage of command: `override <category> <sub category>`
**List of categories:** `command`, `role`
override_invalid_subcategory:
{emote_warn} Invalid `sub category`
{emote_tools} Correct usage of command: `override command <sub category>`
**List of sub categories:** `edit`, `add`, `disable`, `enable`
override_invalid_subcategory_edit_add:
{emote_warn} Invalid `sub category`
{emote_tools} Correct usage of command: `override role <sub category>`
**List of sub categories:** `edit`, `add`
override_invalid_category_subcategory:
{emote_warn} Invalid `category`
{emote_tools} Correct usage of command: `override <category> <sub category>`
**List of categories:** `command`, `role`
**List of sub categories:** `edit`, `add`
overrides_missing_arg_category:
{emote_warn} Missing required argument `category`
{emote_tools} Correct usage of command: `override <category>`
**List of categories:** `command`, `role`
infractiondm_missing_arg_user:
{emote_warn} Missing required argument `user`
{emote_tools} Correct usage of command: `infractiondm <user> <anonymous> <message>`
infractiondm_missing_arg_anonymous:
{emote_warn} Missing required argument `anonymous`
{emote_tools} Correct usage of command: `infractiondm <user> <anonymous> <message>`
infractiondm_missing_arg_message:
{emote_warn} Missing required argument `message`
{emote_tools} Correct usage of command: `infractiondm <user> <anonymous> <message>`
infractiondm_failed: {emote_warn} Could not DM **{user}** `{user_id}`! They very likely have their DMs turned off
infractiondm_sent: {emote_success} Successfully sent an infraction DM to **{user}** `({user_id})`
infractiondm_sent_log:
{emote_warn} **{moderator}** `({moderator_id})` has sent an infraction DM to **{user}** `({user_id}})`
**Content:** {reason}
mute_mute_role_not_found: Unable to find a muted role in this server, please add one by doing `configure|cfg|setting|config mute <mutedRole>`
mute_missing_arg_user:
{emote_warn} Missing required argument `user`
{emote_tools} Correct usage of command: `mute <user> <duration> [reason]`
**Duration:** `w = week`, `d = day`, `h = hour`, `m = minutes`, `s = seconds`
mute_missing_arg_duration:
{emote_warn} Missing required argument `duration`
{emote_tools} Correct usage of command: `mute <user> <duration> [reason]`
**Duration:** `w = week`, `d = day`, `h = hour`, `m = minutes`, `s = seconds`
mute_invalid_duration_second:
{emote_warn} Invalid `duration`, the time can also not be shorter than 1 second 
{emote_tools} Correct usage of command: `mute <user> <duration> [reason]`
**Duration:** `w = week`, `d = day`, `h = hour`, `m = minutes`, `s = seconds`
mute_invalid_duration_year:
{emote_warn} Invalid `duration`, the time can also not be longer than 1 year 
{emote_tools} Correct usage of command: `mute <user> <duration> [reason]`
**Duration:** `w = week`, `d = day`, `h = hour`, `m = minutes`, `s = seconds`
mute_unmuted: {emote_unban} **{user}**#{user_discriminator} `({user_id})` has been automatically unmuted after their mute expired.
tempban_unban: {emote_unban} **{user}**#{user_discriminator} `({user_id})` has been automatically unbanned after their ban expired.
infraction_missing_arg_option:
{emote_warn} Missing required argument `option`
{emote_tools} Correct usage of command: `infraction|inf <option>`
infraction_no_infractions: {emote_warn} User `{user}` doesn't seem to have any infractions.
charinfo_missing_arg_characters:
{emote_warn} Missing required argument `characters` 
{emote_tools} Correct usage of command: `charinfo <characters>`
